data.title: This place is fantastic!
data.text: Everything I have ordered has been DELISH!  I have called in special orders, and all have been met.  Their flavors are fantastic and the shop is so quaint!  You won't be disappointed!

data.title: Tempting Sweets
data.text: A sweet and quaint cafe in downtown - staff is extremely friendly and the selections are excellent - go for the sweets but enjoy their sandwiches too.

data.title: Adorably sweet!
data.text: We had a small family outing today abs decided to try somewhere new. I am so very glad we did! It is an adorable shop with very friendly staff and amazing cupcakes! when you go here make sure you try the Golden Girls cupcake! Pure perfection!!!

data.title: Yum!
data.text: Wow! What a gem in downtown Davenport!  After grabbing lunch at a deli down the street we found this place and wished we had come here instead.  The desserts and tea were to-die-for good!  Definitely stop in for a great sandwich or treat.

data.title: Walk from the convention center.
data.text: What a quaint place! The atmosphere is lovely with great sandwiches. I'm actually not one for sweets but was really pleased with the vegetarian options.

data.title: Nice pastries
data.text: Stopped in for a cup of coffee and a pastry.  They just have brewed coffee (no decaf).  A huge selection of pastries: cookies, cupcakes, brownies, lemon bars, and so much more.  Very good.  A little expensive.

data.title: Not My Style
data.text: I have only been there once and I ordered 2 cupcakes. They weren't my style. I took 1 bite of each and didn't eat anymore.

data.title: One of Downtown Davenport's finest gems
data.text: This is a nice little gem in downtown Davenport that serves up many gourmet bakery selections. Stopped in here for desert after having lunch a couple doors down at "Downtown Deli" (See my review for them). We ordered up six gourmet cup cakes and each one of them were very good. Plenty of seating here with some nice seats in front of their fireplace. Highly recommend stopping here and treating yourself to some luxury deserts.

data.title: Great Breakfast
data.text: Great breakfast sandwiches and coffee.  A little pricey but well worth it.  One thing, make sure the top is on your yogurt in the bag so it doesn't leak all over your sandwich.

data.title: One of the best cupcakes you'll ever taste
data.text:
Had lunch here with co-workers for the first time. Co-workers raved about it. 

Ordered Donna's Delight and it was excellent. BBQ aoli and carmelized onions gave the roast beef that extra flavor you can't get anywhere else. They ran out of wheat bread though so got it with white bread. 

I'm a huge red velvet cake fan so I had to try the red velvet cupcake. It was simply amazing. One of the best red velvet cupcakes I've ever had. The cinnamon roll cupcake was superb too. 

I'd definitely come back here again.

data.title: Disappointing
data.text: We walked in and read the "specials" and knew what we wanted. Got up to the counter and she unapologetically told us they didn't have that. We had a very small choice of cupcakes and it wasn't even noon.  Staff was not friendly at all.  We got an expensive cupcake and was shocked to see how small it was. It was a mini cupcake piled high with frosting. We will never go back. The owner needs to visit Cedar Falls, IA and see a real cupcake shop.

data.title: Deeeeelicious. Seriously head there now
data.text: There is so much variety here it is almost overwhelming. And it is all A-MAZING treats. And lunch too! They have a full ever-changing menu of goodness.

data.title: More variety and nicer than I could have expected!
data.text:
I've passed this business several times but had never gone in until today. They have a beautifully-decorated interior, where you can sit and enjoy a nice bakery item or a cup of soup and sandwich. If you're into design, make note of the Edison bulbs over the front register. Lovely! 

I ordered a chocolate salted caramel cupcake and it was quite delicious! The frosting isn't just "frosting". It's swiss meringue buttercream, which just means it's super smooth and creamy and delicious!! I will be letting people know about this location via social media as well! It's worth a stop!

data.title: Good desserts, service lacking
data.text: They provide nice little dessert options. Don't expect a traditional bakery with brioche breads or croissants. The teenagers they consistently have at the counter are severely lacking in customer service skills.

data.title: Perfect sweets for anniversary treat
data.text:
Reading through the latest "Locals Love Us", I saw the Oh So Sweet ad. Being the day before my anniversary, I thought it was worth a try for a treat.

Ducked in on a Saturday, which turned out to be their one year anniversary. While busy, they still had a good variety of choices. The French Macaroons were amazing, while my wife thought the cupcakes - all of them! - were delicious.

data.title: Awesome brownies - can't wait to go back!
data.text:
I picked up a salted caramel brownie and one called something like "java chocolate" - it was essentially a creamy coffee brownie.  They were EXCELLENT! My wife and I shared them and we both decided the salted caramel one was better, but just by a hair.  

The service here was courteous and prompt even though it was lunch time and I was just getting bakery. A polite young employee even came and offered me a sample of a chocolate and peanut butter "buckeye brownie".  

I  accepted,  of course.

By all means, do stop in here when you are in downtown Davenport - you will thank yourself.

data.title: High Quality Bakery
data.text: This is the only bakery I've ever been in that makes their own graham crackers to put in the deserts they make. Everything that is used, is made in the bakery. I haven't had any of the sandwiches yet but the deserts I've tried are the best.

data.title: Not so Sweet cake;  horrible service by owner
data.text:
We ordered a "Red Velvet" graduation cake for take-out.  It was bone dry, inedible.  My daughter called to complain, Tiphanie, the owner, told her she would have the decorator call her back.   Seven hours later my daughter called again, Tiphanie said she was just getting ready to call her, and her answer was,  oh, too bad, so sad.  
     
Later I returned the cake.  Tiphanie said she would prefer to work with my daughter.  I told her no, I ordered it, I paid for it, and Tiphanie could deal with me.   She stalled, asked for time to speak with her employee.  I stepped out for 15 minutes, when I came back she claimed she had spoken with several other customers who had consumed cakes from the same batch and all were satisfied; and if it did not meet our standards she would refund our money.   She took my only copy of the receipt and said she would refund my money, but it would require contact with her bank in New York and therefore overnight.  It was closing time, so I went home.  
Then I learned that Tiphanie had actually been on the phone with my daughter, blessing her out for posting her unhappiness!   And my daughter had used the words, "did not meet our standards".   So apparently Tiphanie assumed that my daughter (who lives at home) and I would not speak with each other.  

What kind of business owner tells a customer that "everybody else" enjoyed that product?   What kind of business owner telephones a customer and chews them out?    

Bottom Line:  What a personality!

data.title: Happened here by a stroke of luck!
data.text: My son wanted to get donuts at a different place down the street but the other place didn't have donuts that day. We drove around downtown Davenport and decided to try it. Oh my goodness! We were there just as they were opening up. The cinnamon roll I had was one of the best cinnamon rolls I've ever had! My son got a blueberry scone and thought it was fantastic! I went back for lunch and had the hot ham and cheese and a girl scout cookie inspired cupcake. Both were delicious! I will go back now that I've found it.  :)

data.title: Oversold
data.text: People were friendly but I way overpaid for dry, hard cupcakes. Frosting was excellent and variety was impressive but the cakes were awful. Overall for the price, I was extremely unimpressed.
